quoteText: Your information collected through our Service may be stored and processed in the United States or any other country in which Brainly or its affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.
title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
tosdr.tldr: The Privacy Policy states that "your information collected through our Service may be stored and processed in the United States or any other country in which Brainly or its affiliates or service providers maintain facilities."
